meanings.definition: As stated or indicated by someone.
meanings.sent1: She followed the instructions according to the manual.
meanings.sent2: The students lined up according to their height.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed according to the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed according to the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The clock ticked according to the passing minutes.

meanings.definition: In agreement or conformity with something.
meanings.sent1: The report was written according to the guidelines.
meanings.sent2: Her actions were always according to the rules.
meanings.sent3: The cake turned out delicious according to the recipe.
meanings.sent4: His behavior was unpredictable, not according to the norm.
meanings.sent5: The painting was beautiful, according to the artist's vision.

meanings.definition: In proportion or relation to something.
meanings.sent1: The amount of sugar in the recipe was adjusted according to taste.
meanings.sent2: The prices vary according to demand.
meanings.sent3: The car sped up according to the pressure on the gas pedal.
meanings.sent4: Her mood changed according to the weather outside.
meanings.sent5: The tree grew tall according to the nutrients in the soil.
